subtitleNullable: Largest Bangla news article dataset from numerous authentic source, 2.2M news
descriptionNullable:
### Context

News contents are a great source of finding insights for NLP tasks. This dataset contains 2.2M news articles from 3 of the most reliable/popular online, and publicly available newspapers in Bangladesh. 

# Contains most of the available news until April 13, 2022.


### Content

`Source -`
1. [Prothom-alo](https://www.prothomalo.com/)
    - `https://www.prothomalo.com/api/v1`
2. [Jugantor](https://www.jugantor.com/)
     - `https://www.jugantor.com/old/`
     - `https://www.jugantor.com/archive/online-edition/`
     - `https://www.jugantor.com/news-archive/`
3. [Ittefaq](https://www.ittefaq.com.bd/)
     - `https://www.ittefaq.com.bd/archive/online-edition/`
     - `https://archive1.ittefaq.com.bd/archive/`

**Dataset Stats:**
`# total records` = 2, 204, 710

`Prothom-alo `
```
File Information -

pro-part-0.json -> 90000
Tags -> 13
Category -> 19

pro-part-1.json -> 90000
Tags -> 22 
Category -> 22

pro-part-2.json -> 90000
Tags -> 11 
Category -> 20

pro-part-3.json -> 90000
Tags -> 768 
Category -> 26

pro-part-4.json -> 90000
Tags -> 1289 
Category -> 25

pro-part-5.json -> 90000
Tags -> 1034 
Category -> 70

pro-part-6.json -> 90000
Tags -> 897 
Category -> 67

pro-part-7.json -> 90000
Tags -> 862 
Category -> 69

pro-part-8.json -> 90000
Tags -> 1272 
Category -> 93

pro-part-9.json -> 90000
Tags -> 2948 
Category -> 94

pro-part-10.json -> 90000
Tags -> 3639 
Category -> 148

pro-part-11.json -> 79471
Tags -> 4668 
Category -> 196
```

`Jugantor `
```
File Information -
jug-part-0.json -> 238, 147
category -> 43

jug-part-1.json -> 238, 454
category -> 108

jug-part-2.json -> 124, 666
category -> 36

jug-part-3.json -> 115, 406
category -> 30
```

`Ittefaq`
```
File Information -

itte-part-0.json -> 143064
Tags -> 8514  
Category -> 38

itte-part-1.json -> 91716
Tags -> 0  
Category -> 16

itte-part-2.json -> 91754
Tags -> 0  
Category -> 17

itte-part-3.json -> 91877
Tags -> 0  
Category -> 13

itte-part-4.json -> 90155
Tags -> 0  
Category -> 21
```

### Note
This dataset is not totally cleaned, especially `body` data of prothom-alo.

### Acknowledgements

All data-rights reserved to [Prothom-alo](https://www.prothomalo.com/), [Jugantor](https://www.jugantor.com/), and [Ittefaq](https://www.ittefaq.com.bd/)


### Inspiration

- Can you predict news tags/categories?
- Bangla word embeddings.
- Headline generation from news-body/ news summarization.

### Citation
If you intend to use this dataset, please cite the following -
```
@misc{enam biswas_2021, 
title={Bangla Newspaper Dataset - ebD}, 
url={https://www.kaggle.com/dsv/1857507}, 
DOI={10.34740/KAGGLE/DSV/1857507}, 
publisher={Kaggle}, 
author={Enam Biswas}, 
year={2021} }
```
Please feel free to contact - [Enam Biswas](https://www.linkedin.com/in/enam-biswas/) if you have any kind of questions. 

### Other datasets by me
- [IMDb Largest Review Dataset](https://www.kaggle.com/dsv/1836923) - Over 5.5M reviews/ 1.2M spoilers.
- [Place Review Dataset - Niche (USA)](https://www.kaggle.com/dsv/1842046) - Over `700, 000` reviews of USA neighborhood.
